title: Docker Fundamentals Part 1
description:
This workshop was recorded live. Some live elements have been cut out for your enjoyment. Be sure to make use of the timestamps below. Enjoy!

0:00 Course Introduction
6:44 What is Docker
15:44 Containerisation vs. Virtualisation
17:08 How does Docker Work?
20:09 Building a Docker Image
20:16 Live demo
1:03:05 How to Ship Images
1:06:45 Live demo
1:21:40 Applying Theory to Real Apps
1:31:29 Week 1 Assignment
1:35:09 Thanks
